Interface Refreshable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    HomeBasePanel, HospitalPanel, PowerUpDenPanel, ShopPanel, VillainsLairPanel

    public interface Refreshable
    Panels which contain dynamic components should implement the Refreshable interface. This enforces implementation of a refresh() method which is required to update dynamic components.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void refresh() 

    • Method Detail

      • refresh

        void refresh()
